title: Ojima-ojo
author: Ojima-ojo
created_time: December 25, 2022, 08:18:52 PMLast edit: December 26, 2022, 07:31:19 PM by Ojima-ojo
content: So I decided to put some smiles on my face this season by buying Bitcoin as a Christmas gift for myself.yesterday I and my friend/colleagues went to a shopping market for some Christmas shopping we were 6 in number and we all went to the market after receiving our Christmas bonuses from work.My colleagues bought some fine shoes and other expensive items/ wears for themselves and every one of them was expecting me to do some picking myself because we all agreed to go on group shopping but on our way to the market I already have a rethink and a change of mind.I decided to spend my money buying myself some Christmas gifts which is Bitcoin instead of buying some expensive clothes or shoes I decide to carry the digital BTC  in my wallet, instead of wearing shit that will soon get worn out.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: That is a good idea because if you buy shoes and other expensive items, it will be damage one day and you will just not sell it and it will add no value, unlike bitcoin that will add value because the price is low now. But as for me, I have money I invested and that I am still investing on bitcoin, that will not make me not to buy Christmas wears and other things that I needed for Christmas, but what I bought are not expensive.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on December 25, 2022, 08:18:52 PMMy colleagues bought some fine shoes and other expensive items/ wears for themselves and every one of them was expecting me to do some picking myself because we all agreed to go on group shopping but on our way to the market I already have a rethink and a change of mind.I decided to spend my money buying myself some Christmas gifts which is Bitcoin instead of buying some expensive clothes or shoes I decide to carry the digital Gold BTC  in my wallet, instead of wearing shit that will soon get worn out.I was hoping g I would see a thread such as this but not in the contest you did present it and I must say, its good and definitely a commendable one.You know, some might think it's boring and by that, I mean your friends and possibly other persons that are aware of the plans or development since they might not find this fun but, its more about the memory. This one is intangibl, the Christmas is not like every other day and as such, making it iconic by not doing what everyone would do on every other Christmas is definitely unique. Merry bitcoin Christmas.

comments.author: SOKO-DEKE
comments.body: You've taken a good step, and I really like your idea. It's always wiser to spend money on things that will pay off later than to fritter it away on pricey items meant to impress others. You now know that your money is fixed in something that will later be advantageous to you because you invested it in bitcoin. I always tell my friends that they can purchase Bitcoin for a small sum of money that would otherwise be wasted unnecessary things,but they always tell him that those people that make it through Bitcoin  invested huge amounts of money, but always still tell them that small small that due form big but still not believe that.know that no amount of money is small in term of investment especially in crypto investment. Op you have done something great by that action toke.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: It took so courage to have done that, because one would have thought you wouldn't want to displease your friends by having a rethink on how to spend your money, while in their company.Now that the Bitcoin has been bought, I would imploy you  to do all that is necessary to learn how to safe guard it from scammers and market fluctuations, and how to either trade or invest for the long run as you would deem fit to decide upon.Merry Christmas celebration OP.

comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on December 25, 2022, 08:18:52 PMSo I decided to put some smiles on my face this season by buying Bitcoin as a Christmas gift for myself.<...>Well, they say laughter is the best medicine, and it looks like you're taking a big dose with that Bitcoin investment! comments.author: CageMabok
comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on December 25, 2022, 08:18:52 PMSo I decided to put some smiles on my face this season by buying Bitcoin as a Christmas gift for myself.yesterday I and my friend/colleagues went to a shopping market for some Christmas shopping we were 6 in number and we all went to the market after receiving our Christmas bonuses from work.It looks so amazing because after a full year working for a place you can feel the bonus to buy Bitcoin and shop where you like. Christmas celebrations at the end of the year for you will be a very good moment, whatever is spent now can also be used to celebrate the new year, which will arrive soon.QuoteMy colleagues bought some fine shoes and other expensive items/ wears for themselves and every one of them was expecting me to do some picking myself because we all agreed to go on group shopping but on our way to the market I already have a rethink and a change of mind.I don't think there's anything wrong with your colleagues either, because they buy expensive shoes and clothes to celebrate Christmas and maybe to celebrate the new year too. And don't they know about Bitcoin ? If they don't know about buying Bitcoin by the end of the year, it's only natural that they only want to buy shoes and clothes and so have no interest in buying Bitcoin like you do.QuoteI decided to spend my money buying myself some Christmas gifts which is Bitcoin instead of buying some expensive clothes or shoes I decide to carry the digital Gold BTC  in my wallet, instead of wearing shit that will soon get worn out.Actually there is a better idea if the number of bonuses you receive is more. You can set aside at least the amount of bonus money you receive to buy clothes and shoes also for Christmas and for the new year. And the rest you can buy Bitcoin with the remaining amount, so you can get new shoes, new clothes and Bitcoin at the end of this year which will make your Christmas and New Year more enjoyable because you can buy three different things at the end of the year. Even though buying Bitcoins while still wearing old worn clothes won't be any worse for yourself either.

comments.author: RILWAN
comments.body: Ops you have done well for yourself by investing your money instead of spending it on items that can easily become a waste of money, but you should not forget that, you also need those items, such as shoes cloths and the rest but you can buy those things with your Bitcoin in the future from online stores that accept Bitcoin. Unless if Bitcoin is not legally accepted in your country.Once again congratulations on your steady Bitcoin purchase.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on December 25, 2022, 08:18:52 PM~snip~I decided to spend my money buying myself some Christmas gifts which is Bitcoin instead of buying some expensive clothes or shoes I decide to carry the digital Gold BTC  in my wallet, instead of wearing shit that will soon get worn out.If everyone thought like that, then most of those who produce something and those who sell it would have disappeared a long time ago. In this particular case, it might be wise not to invest in expensive clothes, but why not buy yourself something high-quality and functional that will last for many years, and then invest the rest of the money in Bitcoin?In addition, the term "digital gold" is so wrong if you just start from the fact that Bitcoin has a maximum supply, and gold is something that has practically unlimited quantities.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on December 25, 2022, 08:18:52 PMI decided to spend my money buying myself some Christmas gifts which is Bitcoin instead of buying some expensive clothes or shoes I decide to carry the digital Gold BTC  in my wallet, instead of wearing shit that will soon get worn out.A wise decision by you because the expense on bitcoin would give you long term return and fun to buy those expensive shoes and other items your colleagues has bought when you will be in profitable situation.But this would be possible only if you are long term holder and have patience to hold it for next few years.I have also made a similar decision in past where I DCA investment in bitcoin rather then spending on junk food items and have accumulated some sats through it and still holding them so it will eventually pay off in future.I am not saying we should not spend on all those items and wholly invest in bitcoin only but if you have such plans it's good and if not we can enjoy the both with our fund management and some going towards bitcoin investment and rest on gifts.But you have made a really well choice so hope next year Santa comes with lot of bitcoin pumps.Quote from: Lucius on December 26, 2022, 03:05:28 PMIn addition, the term "digital gold" is so wrong if you just start from the fact that Bitcoin has a maximum supply, and gold is something that has practically unlimited quantities.That's the part where I was not happy on comparison with gold as people don't understand they don't have nothing in common and this term is inappropriate.If they see gold is still in abundance and also centrally controlled in way by the government with almost no return in past ten years while bitcoin on the other hand has limited supply and completely decentralised with good returns in the long term period for the holder but if still we compare them both and equate them on same level we are wrong.Bitcoin is far superior then it in almost all aspects.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: Life is short, years of youth are even shorter, so it's important to enjoy it all why you can. The point of life is not hoarding Bitcoin or some other asset, but living life to its fullest. Besides, Bitcoin isn't a money printing machine. There's no guarantee that it will keep going up. Worst case scenario is you deny yourself things that can improve your life and then lose money on top of that. To become rich you don't only need to invest and cut spendings, but also earn more money through work.
